titleInfo.title: 'Ralph Fitch, England's Pioneer to India and Burma. His companions and contemporaries. With his remarkable narrative told in his own words'

physicalDescription.extent: The volume contains a table of contents with chapter headings with page references (pp xi-xiv). Each chapter heading is followed by a detailed breakdown of the contents of that chapter. There is a list of illustrations giving titles and facing page references (pp xv-xvi). There is also an alphabetic index at the back of the volume (pp 261-264) with page references.

mods.abstract: Ralph Fitch, England's Pioneer to India and Burma. His companions and contemporaries. With his remarkable narrative told in his own words, by J Horton Ryley.Publication details: Published by T. Fisher Unwin, Paternoster Square, London, 1899.Physical description: Octavo.
